short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension makes it possible to capture the content of your screen when doing a PingPong interview

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension makes it possible to capture the content of your screen when doing a PingPong remote user research session
